root.name: Bazooka
root.description: OverviewThe game's main goal is to shoot the various enemy vehicles such as jeeps, trucks, motorcycles, and tanks using the mounted bazooka on the arcade cabinet. At the same time the player must also make sure not to hit the ambulances that are passing by.HistoryThe game was release by Project Support Engineering, a company that released 6 other arcade games. Currently, the arcade cabinet is relatively rare, but not very sought after.TechnicalMonitor OrientationHorizontalMonitor TypeStandard resolution, raster graphics, black and whiteNumber of players1ControlsBazookaCabinet StyleUpright
